name: Garden of Ouroboros
description:
A mysterious point and click graphic adventure 

Made by a team of three; Ross McRitchie - Game Designer, Erin McRitchie - Artist and Christine Canavan - Musician.

Controls: Right-click to change actions, left click to interact, and esc to exit. (Point and Click adventure game controls)

Disclaimer: Royalty free sound effects were used from zapsplat.com. All other assets are original.
